short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will check against a list of URLs and close Chrome if there is a match

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you manage a list of URLs to check against to cause chrome to be fully closed. This was utilized for a chrome session started in kiosk mode to exit when a specific URL was reached, instead of expecting a user to use the alt+f4 shortcut.
